title.value: TNM Regional Nodes Staging Type Value Set

publisher.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

name.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description.value: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for regional nodes (N) staging observation.
